Class SimulatorGUI

java.lang.Object
  SimulatorGUI

public class SimulatorGUI
extends java.lang.Object

The Graphical User Interface of the Planets application. Consists of two main components: 1) The drawing canvas to display the simulation 2) An all-around border of action buttons

Version:
1.0.1 28 Feb 2009
Author:
Robin Smith

Constructor Summary
SimulatorGUI(Simulator simulator)
          Create the GUI.
 
Method Summary
 void displayCentralMass()
          Displays the current mass of the simulator's central planet on the canvas.
 void displayCycle()
          Displays the current cycle number of the simulation on the canvas.
 void displayPlanetaryMass()
          Displays the current mass of the simulator's secondary planets on the canvas.
 void displaySimSpeed()
          Displays the current speed of the simulation on the canvas.
 void drawPlanet(Planet planet)
          Draws a planet on the canvas.
 void erasePlanet(Planet planet)
          Erases a planet from the canvas.
 java.awt.Dimension getCanvasSize()
          Accessor method for the dimensions of the GUI's drawing canvas.
 void intro()
          Displays an introduction to the simulation on the canvas.
 void setUpCanvas()
          Sets up the canvas by displaying initial information.
 void wait(int time)
          Instructs the canvas to wait for a specified amount of time.
